commitments.commitment: Get Ergo Fight Club added to the list of groups and talk to Glasgow about it

open_questions.question: Will the ecosystem start to see more Ethereum-related apps made on Ergo but for Ethereum?
open_questions.context: Discussion about Rosen Bridge enabling cross-chain functionality

open_questions.question: Will Ethereum users bring ETH over to Ergo or pick up ERG, and how will they use the bridge?
open_questions.context: Speculation about user behavior with Rosen Bridge

open_questions.question: What are the consequences of ADA tokens like SundaeSwap tokens now being on Ethereum?
open_questions.context: Discussion about tokens crossing chains via Rosen

key_facts.fact: ErgoHack 9 is upcoming, focused on enhancing user experience innovations in UI, UX and mining
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: Rosen Bridge has crossed the bridge to Ethereum
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark

key_facts.fact: SigmaUSD interest rates were at 60s, 70% and reached 120% at one point
key_facts.speaker: tim.erg

key_facts.fact: Rosen Bridge is planning to connect Binance chain and Sui, and waiting on a major Monero update before prioritizing that connection
key_facts.speaker: tim.erg
